movies.title: The Last King of Scotland
movies.plot: Young Scottish doctor, Nicholas Garrigan decides it's time for an adventure after he finishes his formal education, so he decides to try his luck in Uganda, and arrives during the downfall of President Obote. General Idi Amin comes to power and asks Garrigan to become his personal doctor.

events.title: Idi Amin overthrows president Milton Obote
hijacked Air France Flight 139 lands at Entebbe Airport in Uganda

movies.title: Amelia
movies.plot: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

events.title: Amelia Earhart becomes the first woman to fly across the Atlantic Ocean, as a passenger
Amelia Earhart marries George Puttnam
Amelia Earhart becomes the first woman to pilot a plane across the Atlantic Ocean
Amelia Earhart crashes her plane on the runway in Hawaii
Amelia Earhart goes missing over the Pacific Ocean

movies.title: Notorious
movies.plot: NOTORIOUS is the story of Christopher Wallace. Through raw talent and sheer determination, Wallace transforms himself from Brooklyn street hustler (once selling crack to pregnant women) to one of the greatest rappers of all time; THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G. Follow his meteoric rise to fame and his refusal to succumb to expectations - redefining our notion of "The American Dream."

movies.title: The Clearing
movies.plot: When affluent executive Wayne Hayes is kidnapped by a disgruntled employee and held for ransom in a forest, Wayne’s wife is forced to reckon with the FBI agents as they negotiate with the kidnapper.

movies.title: 127 Hours
movies.plot: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.
movies.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 144 nominations.

movies.title: Hitchcock
movies.plot: HITCHCOCK follows the relationship between director Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the making of his most famous film, PSYCHO, and the trials and tribulations the director faced from Hollywood censors.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 28 nominations.

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.plot: An other-worldly story, set against the backdrop of Cold War era America circa 1962, where a mute janitor working at a lab falls in love with an amphibious man being held captive there and devises a plan to help him escape.

movies.title: Battle of the Sexes
movies.plot: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 19 nominations.
